img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 71.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e7/Wukong_Pagoda_71.jpg)
His most dangerous attack is a repeated spinning divebomb attack he can perform repeatedly to dash at you from all angles. Once you get the timing down, a Rock Solid deflection can stop him cold, or you can Cloud Step to the side and retaliate as he flies past.
img_below_text:
Once defeated, look to the right past where he appeared to find a broken walkway with several rock platforms you can carefully drop down to find the other side of the pagoda's Level 4 walkway.
![Wukong Pagoda 73.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/45/Wukong_Pagoda_73.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 69 from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Pagoda 71.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e7/Wukong_Pagoda_71.jpg)
His most dangerous attack is a repeated spinning divebomb attack he can perform repeatedly to dash at you from all angles. Once you get the timing down, a Rock Solid deflection can stop him cold, or you can Cloud Step to the side and retaliate as he flies past."
            - Following Text: "Once defeated, look to the right past where he appeared to find a broken walkway with several rock platforms you can carefully drop down to find the other side of the pagoda's Level 4 walkway.
![Wukong Pagoda 73.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/45/Wukong_Pagoda_73.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist, Wukong, standing on a snowy ledge. This image follows a description of a challenging enemy encounter involving a spinning divebomb attack and precedes instructions on navigating to a broken walkway with rock platforms. The image likely serves to illustrate the aftermath of defeating the enemy and the next steps in the player's progression through the pagoda's Level 4 walkway.
